reviews.review_msg: Dr. Leroux is the most sincere and caring prof Ive had during my time at SFU. He explains all concepts exceptionally well and encourages questions during and after class. If you ever have a chance to take his class, do not hesitate. The grading was clear and there are many opportunities for you to get a decent grade.
Dr. Leroux is very enthusiastic about the subject, and explains concepts very clearly. Lectures are very useful, and he gives good feedback. Don't skip lectures and do put in an effort.

Dr. Leroux is a fantastic professor, who is not only incredibly knowledgeable, but genuinely cares that you succeed in the course. MBB 309 is a lab course, so you need to come prepared, having already read and understood the purpose of each step in the experimental protocol. I learned so much in this course and a lot of that is credit to Dr. Leroux
I wish Dr. Leroux would teach more upper MBB courses. Prepare well for the final quiz, which can be challenging.
